channel.title: Here's a suggestion for the forum rules...(Can't find anywhere else to put)
channel.description: If someone has something in the wrong section, people should get warnings for posting "Wrong Section" 100 times. Not only is that pointless spam, but it bumps the topic, and if it's in the tutorial section it knocks peoples helpful tutorials off the list, let the thread die ffs.

item.title: Here's a suggestion for the forum rules...(Can't find anywhere else to put)
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

He means like, if someone posted “Need help!” in the tutorial section, a billion people would view it and say “Wrong Section, noob” or flame the person.

Read full topic
